alert.note: Alert for Canadian (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 10 at 4:55PM CDT until April 10 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BLAINE AND NORTHWESTERN CANADIAN COUNTIES... At 455 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Watonga, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Watonga, Geary, Hydro, Bridgeport, and Greenfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
